nodes.text: The Bondsman Guild Protocol was a protocol which dictated the procedure and policies to be followed in providing an individual to a bounty hunter or other authorities. Subparagraph 16 of this protocol compelled individuals holding an asset to immediately produce it to a bounty hunter under certain conditions. A degree of respectability was gained with the conferral of the protocols. Around 9 ABY, the IG-series droid bounty hunter IG-11 cited the Bondsman Guild Protocol, and subparagraph 16 specifically, while attempting to retrieve "the asset" during a mission on Arvala-7.
